name: COALESCE
description: Returns the first non-NULL expression from the list.

parameters.name: expressions
parameters.description: Two or more expressions to evaluate

examples.title: First non-NULL
examples.sql: SELECT COALESCE(mobile, home_phone, work_phone, 'No phone') as contact_phone FROM users

examples.title: Default value
examples.sql: SELECT COALESCE(nickname, name) as display_name FROM users

examples.title: Multiple fallbacks
examples.sql: SELECT COALESCE(preferred_email, work_email, personal_email, 'unknown@example.com') as email FROM contacts

notes: All expressions should have compatible types
